name: Avoid large Classes - too many Methods (JEE)
description:
Classes should have less than X Methods.
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all the Classes having more than X Methods.
It provides the following information:
 - Class full name
 - Number of Methods
rationale: A class contains an unnecessarily large number of methods. This issue makes it more difficult to understand and maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities. It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.
remediation: Review the Class design to reduce the number of Methods
alternativeName: Ensure you review the Class design to reduce the number of Methods
